articles.title: Greetings to President of Mozambique
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Mozambique
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Armando Emilio Guebuza, president of Mozambique, on the occasion of its national day.
					The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and wished Mozambican president greater success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets German Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets German Ambassador
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with German Ambassador to the DPRK Gerhard Thiedemann, who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: Delegation of Journalists Union of Korea Leaves for China
articles.content:
Delegation of Journalists Union of Korea Leaves for China
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Journalists Union of Korea led by Vice-Chairman Ri Hyok Song left here Monday to visit China.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Visit to Mongolia Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Visit to Mongolia Marked
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the Mongolian embassy here had a friendly meeting at DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Songyo Junior Secondary School in Songyo District on Monday on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's visit to Mongolia. 
					Present there were Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the committee and chairman of the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Association, officials concerned, teachers and students of the school, Mongolian Ambassador to the DPRK Manibadrakh Ganbold and staff members of his embassy.
					
					After being briefed on the history of the school, the guests toured education facilities.
					
					The participants talked with each other about the need to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and enjoyed an art performance given by students.

articles.title: Personages of Bulgaria, Nigeria Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Personages of Bulgaria, Nigeria Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Embassies
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) ? Bulgarian and Nigerian personages paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK embassies in Dhaka and Lagos on June 4 and 19 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). They are Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, Ragib Ahsan Munna, secretary general of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, and M. M. Alhassan, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					They laid floral baskets before a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their full-length picture and paid tribute to them.
					
					The chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said:
					
					The popular masses are the driving force of the revolution and construction and they have inexhaustible strength and wisdom to push forward the revolution and construction. The benevolent image of Kim Jong Il, who further strengthened the WPK into the party serving the people, will always be remembered by the Juche idea followers of Nigeria.
					
					The noble outlook of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un on the people is being firmly embodied in the activities of the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Work in Tanchon Area
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Work in Tanchon Area
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made field surveys of the work of the Tanchon Magnesia Factory, Tanchon Smeltery and Tanchon Port.
					Going round various places in Tanchon area, he encouraged the workers who are bringing about innovations in production, true to the appeal sent by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un in which he called for ushering in a new heyday on all fronts of socialist construction by creating the "Masikryong Speed".
					
					He held a consultative meeting on the spot. Discussed there were matters on stepping up the modernization of equipment, finishing at an early date the construction of fresh production processes and using and managing well Tanchon Port.
					
					Measures were also taken to reenergize the production in various units including the Tanchon Magnesia Factory by thoroughly carrying out the last instructions of leader Kim Jong Il, and to let the ministries, national institutions and other related units fully supply raw and other materials needed for the modernization and construction.
					
					The premier also learned about the operation of the Sangnong Mine.
					
					Making the rounds of various places of the mine, he underscored the need to accelerate modernization and scientization of the mineral production, realize massive mining and dressing of ores and increase the actual extraction rate in concentration.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Work in Komdok Area
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Work in Komdok Area
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made field surveys of production in mines and other industrial establishments and the work for preventing damage in rainy season, while going round different places of Komdok area.
					He encouraged the officials and workers there in their dynamic drive to bring about a signal boost in production, aware of their important revolutionary duty.
					
					A consultative meeting held on the spot discussed the matters of radically increasing the production at the Taehung Youth Hero Mine and other mines and industrial establishments, true to the noble intention of the Workers' Party of Korea and developing the processing trade.
					
					The meeting referred to the importance of keeping the equipment in full-capacity operation and putting them on a modern basis.
					
					He underscored the need for the ministries, national institutions and other relevant units to supply a sufficient quantity of raw and other materials and took measures for preventing the damage in rainy season.

articles.title: U.S., Provoker of Korean War
articles.content:
U.S., Provoker of Korean War
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- It is none other than the United States that provoked a war in the Korean Peninsula in the 1950s. 
					After the Second World War, the U.S. imperialists occupied south Korea and established the military rule there to step up war preparations for domination over whole Korea.
					
					They committed armed provocations in the areas along the 38th parallel almost every day, with an aim of increasing the actual war capacity of the south Korean puppet army as their bullet-shield and rendering the situation tense in order to ignite the Korean War for an invasion of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					From September 1945 to the end of 1946, the south Korean forces, under the U.S. instruction, made such persistent provocations on 106 occasions as military espionage on the DPRK, plunder, killing and abduction of its citizens and arson of their villages. 
					
					Their armed provocations escalated in 1947, bringing the situation to the brink of war. The U.S. imperialists let the puppet combat police and defence guards units conduct armed provocations for 454 times in an attempt to seize important heights in the areas north of the 38th parallel.
					
					From 1948 they intensified anti-DPRK armed provocations. That year witnessed more than 930 cases of provocations involving 6,030 armed bandits as well as various sorts of sabotages conducted by the group of 1,074 terrorists infiltrated into the areas north of the 38th parallel.
					
					In 1949 the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces deployed four divisions and one regiment of the puppet army in the areas along the demarcation line while reinforcing combat police units there.
					
					According to data available, there were 2,617 cases of armed provocations involving 67,398 servicepersons in the period. The depth of their attack was 2~17 kilometers and the depth of action for "special units" about 60 km.
					
					They had also committed ceaseless armed provocations in the sea and sky 69 times and 79 times respectively in 1949.
					
					Their armed provocations in the areas along the 38th parallel got evermore pronounced in 1950. While speeding up war preparations, they committed as many as 1,147 armed provocations till the outbreak of the Korean War from January.
					
					As seen above, those armed provocations directed by the U.S. imperialists were evidently deliberate military actions for a total war and a prelude to the Korean War.

articles.title: DPRK History Society Brands U.S. as Provoker of Korean War
articles.content:
DPRK History Society Brands U.S. as Provoker of Korean War
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The History Society of the DPRK Monday released a memorandum disclosing the true colors of the U.S. imperialists as provoker of the Korean war with the approach of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					The U.S. is the chieftain of aggression as it sparked inter-Korean confrontation and fratricidal war in Korea, the memorandum said, and went on:
					
					After the Second World War it occupied south Korea, pursuant to its criminal policy for invading the whole of Korea and dominating the world. It divided the Korean nation into two parts, escalating confrontation between Koreans and imposing all sorts of misfortunes and sufferings upon them. 
					
					Already more than a century ago the U.S. defined it as its state policy to invade Korea, gateway to the Asian Continent. In February 1845, the U.S. ruling quarters presented a "bill for forcing Korea to open" to its Congress and left no means untried to invade Korea. 
					
					The U.S. embarked upon the road of invading Korea with the intrusion of its aggressor ship General Sherman in 1866 as an occasion, but it was repulsed by the struggle of people in Mangyongdae and soldiers and people of the Walled City of Pyongyang. Then followed ceaseless U.S. aggression such as the intrusion of the warships Shenandoah and China in 1868 and the large-scale invasion in 1871 in a bid to conquer the Korean nation.
					
					From August 10 to 15 of 1945, the U.S. imperialists cooked up the 38th parallel under the pretext of "the line for sharing responsibility" for receiving the surrender of the Japanese Army. Their forces occupied south Korea under the mask of "liberator" from September 8 to the end of October. 
					
					On Sept. 7, 1945, the U.S. imperialists declared U.S. military administration across south Korea through Proclamation No. 1 of the MacArthur Command. It unreasonably brought the issue of Korea to the UN and cooked up a "decision" on holding separated elections in south Korea and set up a pro-U.S. regime opposed to communism through suppression and fraud and swindle. 
					
					After the emergence of the puppet regime in south Korea the U.S. imperialists frantically stepped up preparations for invading the DPRK. 
					
					They built a puppet army to be used as a shock brigade for carrying out the war of aggression and rapidly beefed up its strength. 
					
					They sent a 500-strong U.S. military advisory group, the biggest in the world at that time, to south Korea for the purpose of establishing a commanding system, forming units of the south Korean puppet army, etc. in the same way as done at the U.S. forces and making it undergo military trainings under the command of the group. 
					
					The real aim sought by the U.S. imperialists in preparing the war of aggression was fully revealed by their process of working out and rounding off the war scenario.
					
					Their scenario had three phases.
					
					Its phase A was to launch the Korean War, its phase B was to escalate the war into China and its phase C was to intrude into Siberia. The U.S. envisaged 1949 as the year to start the operation.
					
					In order to verify the feasibility of the war scenario the U.S. imperialists drove the south Korean puppet army keen on "northern expedition" to armed provocations.
					
					Consequently, such battles reminiscent of a real war continued in areas along the 38th parallel even on the eve of the Korean War which broke out on June 25. 
					
					The U.S. hatched a crafty and base plot to evade the responsibility for the provocation of the war against the DPRK.
					
					In October 1949, it cooked up at the 4th session of the UN General Assembly "the 3rd UN Commission on Korea" whose mission was to cover up the truth behind the outbreak of the Korean war and make profound confusing of right and wrong under the pretexts of monitoring and reporting "the military dispute in Korea".
					
					In the meantime, it had already worked out "basic documents" and "resolutions" to be presented to the meeting of the UN Security Council and the sessions of the UN General Assembly after the outbreak of the war.
					
					Dulles inspected positions of the south Korean puppet army along areas south of the 38th parallel after flying into Seoul in June 1950 and finally examined the war scenario, looking at operation maps and a model board showing the operational theaters.
					
					In the wake of his trip to Seoul the then defense secretary and the then chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff visited the MacArthur Command in Tokyo. Their Tokyo visits were aimed to decide on the issue of hurling U.S. units in the Far East into the battlefields of the Korean war whose outbreak was an established fact and examine the readiness to go into an action on the spot.
					
					The U.S. imperialists provoked that criminal war of aggression by hurling south Korean puppet units at 4 a.m. on June 25, 1950.
					
					MacArthur, who played a main role in igniting the Korean war, said that the war was his plan, admitting the provocation of the war.
					
					The U.S. should not forget its disgraceful history in which it was compelled to sign a document of surrender before the Korean  people though it mobilized huge armed forces and latest military hardware for the war, warned the memorandum.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifters Bag Medals in Asian Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifters Bag Medals in Asian Championship
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK players proved successful on the first day of the 2013 Asian Weightlifting Championship now under way in Astana, Kazakhstan.
					In men's 62 kg category Kim Un Guk succeeded in lifting 145 kg in snatch and 170 kg in clean-and-jerk, winning first place in both events. He came top in total points, bagging three gold medals.
					
					Om Yun Chol also bagged three gold medals in men's 56 kg category events, 126 kg in snatch and 160 kg in clean-and-jerk.
					
					Ryang Chun Hwa, in women's 48 kg category events, took three gold medals by proving first in both snatch and clean-and-jerk in which she raised 80 kg and 110 kg respectively.
					
					The championship is going on.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifters Prove Successful
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifters Prove Successful
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifters continue to prove successful in the 2013 Asian Weightlifting Championship.
					They bagged three gold medals, five silvers and five bronzes in various categories on Saturday.
					
					Kim Kwang Song succeeded in snatching 164kg in 77kg category to come first in men's snatch and third in the jerk to place third in total. Kim Myong Hyok won the gold medal in the 69kg jerk by lifting 178kg.
					
					Ri Jong Hwa succeeded in snatching 105kg in women's 58kg category to come first in the snatch and second in the jerk, thus placing second in total. She bagged one gold medal and two silvers.
					
					In the meantime Jo Pok Hyang came second in the women's 63kg jerk and took the third place in the women's snatch event of the same category. She came second in total points. Jong Chun Mi also came second and third in the women's 58kg snatch and jerk events to come third in total standing.
					
					The game continues.

articles.title: Pyongyang City Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work
articles.content:
Pyongyang City Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang City meeting took place at the Central Hall of Workers Sunday to mark the 40th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Prevent a National Division and Reunify the Country".
					The work was published on June 23, Juche 62 (1973) at a time when the Korean nation faced the danger of permanent division due to the moves of the separatists at home and abroad to plot "two Koreas".
					
					The work clarifies the five-point policy for national reunification which reflects the fixed will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to tide over the prevailing difficulties and usher in a new phase of national reunification.
					
					Present at the meeting were Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon, Ro Tu Chol, Chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party Kim Yong Dae, Chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee Cha Hui Rim, Director of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Kang Ji Yong, Director of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea Kim Wan Su, officials of social organizations, officials concerned and other people in Pyongyang.
					
					Yang Hyong Sop, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a report.
					
					The five-point policy for national reunification advanced by the President is the Juche-based programme for reunification and political great programme for national unity as it clearly indicates the way of shattering the moves of the separatists at home and abroad and reunifying the country independently by concerted efforts of all the Koreans on the three principles of national reunification, the reporter said.
					
					With the advancement of the five-point policy for national reunification by the President, the Korean nation could wage a more dynamic struggle for national reunification with the clear goal and orientation, he noted.
					
					The cause of national reunification pioneered and led by the President was successfully carried forward and developed by leader Kim Jong Il, the reporter said.
					
					He called upon all the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad to wage a dynamic struggle for invariably preserving and thoroughly implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, great programmes for reunification common to the nation and landmarks for peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats in Updating Nation's Economy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats in Updating Nation's Economy
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il in his lifetime made big efforts to turn the nation's economy into a knowledge-based one, with stress laid on putting the machinery industry on a CNC basis.
					Even in the days of the arduous march, the forced march when the country was in hard time, he took a measure to channel a large amount of fund to developing CNC technology. He personally indicated the phase-to-phase tasks the scientists should carry out to develop CNC machines.
					
					He put forward the slogans "Keep your feet firmly planted on your land and look out over the world!" and "Break through the cutting edge!" to be held high by the local scientists in their research work.
					
					His tireless efforts led scientists and technicians of the Ryonha Machine Factory to develop high-performance CNC machine tools in a span of 10 years and mass-produce them.
					
					Lots of industrial establishments were updated and signal scientific achievements made in all fields of the national economy under his wise and energetic guidance.
					
					The country also witnessed successes in satellite launch and underground nuclear test.
					
					The DPRK people are now recalling Kim Jong Il's patriotic devotion to the industrial revolution in the country with the 49th anniversary of his start of work at the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea as an occasion, while hardening their will to push ahead with the building of a thriving socialist nation under the guidance of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Appeal Encourages DPRK People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Appeal Encourages DPRK People
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on June 4 sent an appeal to the army and people, calling upon them to usher in a fresh heyday on all fronts of socialist construction in the spirit of the "Speed on Masik Pass".
					Since then, great innovations have been reported one after another from across the country.
					
					Service personnel, mobilized in building the ski ground in the area of Masik Pass, have made a great upsurge in the project, determined to finish it on all accounts by the end of this year.
					
					Soldier-builders, involved in the reconstruction of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, are pressing ahead with the project at a final stage.
					
					Eye-catching achievements have been also made by solider-builders in the projects for reclamation of the Sepho tableland and construction of Munsu Wading Pool, Mirim Riding Club and Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of the Korean People's Army.
					
					The second-stage project for the Huichon Power Station is progressing apace.
					
					Choe Yong Su, an official of the Pyongyang City Shock Brigade, told KCNA that his brigade would carry out its assignments as scheduled in the spirit of the "Speed on Masik Pass".
					
					The "Speed on Masik Pass" led to fresh innovations in the projects for expanding the Kosan Fruit Farm, building the gravity-fed waterway in South Hwanghae Province and face-lifting Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and sports village in Chongchun Street and on all other fields of the national economy.

articles.title: Indignation Meeting of Workers, Trade Union Members Held
articles.content:
Indignation Meeting of Workers, Trade Union Members Held
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- An indignation meeting of workers and trade union members was held in Kaesong City Monday on the occasion of June 25, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism.
					A reporter and speakers said that all the workers and trade union members across country are expressing towering indignation and animosity against the U.S. imperialists, sworn enemies of the Koreans, and the south Korean group of traitors on the occasion.
					
					Disclosing the fact that the U.S. imperialists reduced into ashes everything on this land ranging from factories, farming and fishing villages and schools to hospitals and killed innocent people in a cruel manner during the three-year war, they went on:
					
					The army and people of the DPRK, rallied close around President Kim Il Sung, defeated the U.S. imperialists who were boasting of being the "strongest" in the world, to honorably defend the sovereignty of the nation and the gains of the revolution.
					
					The U.S. imperialists, the arch criminal of aggression and war, are working hard to launch another war of aggression against the DPRK, far from drawing a bitter lesson from the past Korean war.
					
					If the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors unleash a war of aggression, the army and people of the DPRK will mercilessly annihilate the aggressors, provocateurs and give vent to the pent-up grudge.
					
					The reporter and speakers called for devotedly defending the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un politically and ideologically and becoming genuine comrades and comrades-in-arms who share the same faith, breath and thinking and keep pace with him.

articles.title: Jangmyong-trademarked Health Product Popular in DPRK
articles.content:
Jangmyong-trademarked Health Product Popular in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Jangmyong-trademarked health product, manufactured by the Jangmyong Pharmaceutical Institute of the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK, is enjoying popularity among local people.
					The health product, with mushroom polysaccharide as a main ingredient, helps enhance immunity in human body and prevent various kinds of diseases, including encephaloma, breast cancer and leucopenia. It also improves appetite and prevents aging.
					
					It was awarded a gold prize at the 23rd Geneva International Exhibition of Inventions, New Technologies and Products held in Juche 84 (1995).
					
					The product is efficacious for patients affected by radioactive rays and good for beefing up physical abilities of athletes.

articles.title: Sinchon Museum Visited by Lots of People
articles.content:
Sinchon Museum Visited by Lots of People
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) ? A large number of people, including servicepersons and schoolchildren, have visited the Sinchon Museum on the occasion of June 25, the day when the U.S. imperialists ignited a war of aggression.
					The museum indicts the U.S. imperialists and class enemies for killing in cold blood innocent civilians who accounted for a quarter of the population of Sinchon County during 52 days of their occupation of it during the Korean People's Army's temporary strategic retreat during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					The U.S. imperialists cut the heads of men with saw or axe and drove spikes into their foreheads.
					
					They threw gasoline over 102 children crying for food and 400 mothers crying for their children.
					
					In June, more than 40 000 service personnel and people from all walks of life visited the museum, refreshing their pledge to take revenge on enemies and protect the country.
					
					The visitors went round the air raid shelter where people were massacred and a tomb of patriots.
					
					They held meetings to pledge revenge and vehemently denounced the U.S. imperialists keen on their moves to provoke a nuclear war in violation of the sovereign rights and dignity of the DPRK and the south Korean puppet group keen on the racket for escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Yuphyong Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Crowd of Visitors
articles.content:
Yuphyong Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Crowd of Visitors
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) ? Many people, including servicepersons and schoolchildren,  have visited the Yuphyong Revolutionary Site in Changsong County, North Phyongan Province every day with the approach of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					The revolutionary site is a significant place which tells stories that President Kim Il Sung instilled the faith of sure victory into commanding officers and solders of the KPA and learned in detail about the wartime farming in the village on October 26, Juche 39 (1950).
					
					Hearing stories that the President sent the soldiers guarding the Supreme Command to the front, thinking of the victory in the war more than his own safety, the visitors looked round the simple peasant house, telephone, dinner-table, etc. preserved there with good care.
					
					They recollected the immortal exploits the President performed by setting forth the outstanding idea and war methods in the house without even an operation table to bring about a victory in the war.

articles.title: Korea's Historical Relics Listed as World's Cultural Heritages
articles.content:
Korea's Historical Relics Listed as World's Cultural Heritages
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- It was decided at the 37th Meeting of the World Heritage Committee of the UNESCO to register historical relics in Kaesong City, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, as world's cultural heritages.
					Kaesong was a capital city of Koryo Dynasty (918-1392), the first unified state in Korea, for nearly 500 years.
					
					More than 90 kinds of relics are preserved in the city.
					
					Among the relics listed as world's heritages this time are the mausoleums of King Wang Kon (1st king) and King Kong Min (31st king), South Gate of Kaesong, Kaesong Walls, Sungyang School, Monument to Loyalty, Sonjuk Bridge, Koryo Songkyunkwan Academy, Manwol Pavilion, Kaesong Chomsongdae (astronomical observatory) and two groups of tombs.
					
					The mausoleum of King Kong Min is, in particular, preserved in original state. It is an earth-covered stone grave with remains of the king and the queen buried in it. The grave is believed to be built from 1365 to 1372 at the initiative of King Kong Min.
					
					The group of Myongrung tombs is located in a row, three of which stand at intervals of 25 meters or 50 meters respectively between the mausoleums of kings Kong Min and Wang Kon.
					
					The group of seven tombs is located at the foot of Mt. Mansu in Haeson-ri.
					
					The tombs were robbed by the Japanese invaders during their colonial rule over Korea.
					
					Believed to be built in 1391-1393, the South Gate, situated in the heart of Kaesong City, was burnt by the U.S. bombing in December 1950 during the Korean War (1950-1953), but it was restored to original state in 1954.
					
					The relics give a glimpse of the development of the national culture in the period of the dynasty.
					
					Tourists from Switzerland, the Netherlands, Britain and other countries are coming to the city to see the relics.
					
					The recent registration of 12 kinds of relics as the world's heritages, in the wake of the registration of the Koguryo tomb murals at the 28th Meeting held in China in 2004, raises the Korean people's national pride.

articles.title: Vital Rights of Part-time Workers Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Vital Rights of Part-time Workers Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- A mass rally took place at the plaza of Seoul Railway Station on June 22 in support of the vital rights of school part-time workers, according to CBS of south Korea.
					It was attended by more than 10,000 unionists under the Solidarity Council of School Part-time Workers.
					
					Its participants demanded the authorities guarantee the school part-timers stable employment and improve their living conditions.
					
					It was reported that at least 3,500 members of the Headquarters of School Part-time Workers under the Public Transport Trade Union and over 500 members of the Women's Trade Union held meetings at Sodaemun and Jongro districts to join the rally.

articles.title: Day of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Italy
articles.content:
Day of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Italy
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War was inaugurated in Rome on June 19.
					Alfonso Galdi, director of the International Department of the Leftwing People's Party of Communists of Italy, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Day of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Ukraine
articles.content:
Day of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Ukraine
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- A Ukrainian preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War was inaugurated in Kiev on June 17.
					Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the Ukraine-DPRK Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					It decided to organize political and cultural events including seminar and photo exhibition and issue special bulletin on the occasion of the anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on June 19, the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					The statement said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., WPK on June 19, 1964 was a noteworthy event in the history of the Korean revolution. It went on:
					
					He, closest comrade-in-arm unfailingly faithful to President Kim Il Sung, actively assisted him in his work.
					
					He announced that the great Juche idea is the unique guiding idea of the WPK and cemented the unity and cohesion of the whole party by all means.
					
					He was the great leader of the nation who made tireless efforts for the country's reunification and provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					Under his Songun revolutionary leadership the DPRK turned into a powerful nuclear weapons state which can resolutely shatter the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to ignite an aggressive war.
					
					He passed away to our sorrow but his revolutionary cause is being successfully carried forward by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Kim Jong Un formulated the revolutionary idea of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and is leading the WPK to be their party.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats in Party Building Praised by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats in Party Building Praised by Foreign Organizations
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different countries and regional organization posted on their websites special write-ups from June 10 to 17 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					The Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il in an article titled "Invincible Workers' Party of Korea and its secret" said that he, who started his work at the WPK Central Committee on June 19, 1964, set a great example in building the revolutionary party of the working class.
					
					The WPK is fully demonstrating its might as an invincible party, the article noted, adding: The credit for this goes to the guiding idea of the WPK, unity and cohesion of the whole party and absolute support and trust of the people in the party, which is pushing forward the whole socialist cause with the army as the main force and pillar.
					
					The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article dealing with his undying feats in history of party building, illustrated with his photo.
					
					The article introduced his undying feats in party building, adding:
					
					His feats in party building are being successfully carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					The WPK will shed its rays forever as the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as it is led by Kim Jong Un possessed of extraordinary wisdom and distinguished leadership ability.
					
					The Group for Solidarity with the DPRK, the Rostov-Na-Donu Anti-Bourgeois Front and other organizations of Russia and the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions carried articles praising him for strengthening the WPK into an invincible party.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Organizations, Institutions
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Organizations, Institutions
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Organizations and institutions of different countries posted on their websites articles in the period from June 13 to 17 to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in an article titled "Kim Jong Ilâ€™s feats in building Workers' Party of Korea" said he strengthened the WPK into an integral whole transparent in ideology and a genuine people's party which achieved unity and cohesion.
					
					The feats he performed in party building and activities will shine long with the WPK winning victory after victory, the article noted.
					
					The Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il in an article titled "Kim Jong Il's patriotism" praised him, whom the Korean people revere as the eternal leader and general secretary of the WPK, as a paragon of genuine patriots.
					
					The article noted that at the end of the last century he firmly defended the destiny of the country and the nation and opened an epochal phase of building a thriving socialist nation, holding high the banner of Songun.
					
					Patriotism he personally embodied in practice is, indeed, noblest and distinguished patriotism which can be linked only with his august name in view of its essential contents and vitality, the article stressed.
					
					The MS Tourist Agency of Germany posted an article praising him for his undying feats in party building.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Anniversary Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Anniversary Celebrated Abroad
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held by political parties and organizations of Bangladesh, Mexico and UK from June 13 to 17 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					Present there were officials of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, Bangladesh National Socialist Party, Bangladesh Communist Party, Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, Workers' Party of Mexico and the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) and masses.
					
					Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee 49 years ago was a historic event of weighty significance in developing the WPK and the Korean revolution.
					
					Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, praised Kim Jong Il as the eternal general secretary of the WPK who strengthened it into the staff of the Korean revolution and the mother party taking good care of the destiny of the people with responsibility and the outstanding statesman who turned the DPRK into the political and ideological power and invincible military power.
					
					Michael Chant, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), lauded Kim Jong Il's undying feats in party building, saying that they are being successfully carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Proposal for Peace Treaty Supported by Bulgarian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Proposal for Peace Treaty Supported by Bulgarian Organization
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association issued a statement on June 10 in support of the stand of the DPRK on replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty.
					Since its conclusion the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA) has been violated by the U.S. and south Korean authorities, notably the large-scale joint military exercises recently staged by them, the statement said, and went on:
					
					The AA can not guarantee durable peace.
					
					Accordingly, the U.S. should seriously approach the DPRK's proposal for creating peaceful circumstances, far from slandering it and causing an armed conflict.
					
					The conclusion of a peace treaty will not fully guarantee peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula but help settle various problems for defusing the tensions in the region.
					
					We fully support the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty.
					
					The world wants peace, not war.

articles.title: Thai Organizations Hail June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Thai Organizations Hail June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association and the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand issued statements on June 14 on the occasion of the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association said:
					
					Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, in his New Year Address for 2013 clarified the principled stand on removing the confrontation between the north and the south of Korea, thoroughly implementing the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and pooling the efforts of the Korean nation to settle the reunification issue independently.
					
					The past inter-Korean relations prove that the implementation of the joint declaration will lead to north-south reconciliation and unity and peaceful development but the denial of it will lead to distrust, confrontation and war.
					
					The only way of achieving durable peace on the Korean Peninsula is to implement the joint declaration.
					
					The Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand said that all the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad are longing for the June 15 era of reunification and are becoming increasingly assertive in calling for respecting and following through on the joint declaration.
					
					Kim Jong Un is leading the struggle for development of inter-Korean relations and national reunification, it said, expressing expectation and belief that the Korean nation would reunify the country at an early date under the banner of the joint declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Banda Moranbong junto con obreros de provincia de Jagang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Banda Moranbong junto con obreros de provincia de Jagang
Pyongyang, 24 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio una funcion de la Banda Moranbong junto con la clase obrera de la provincia de Jagang.
					La vieron tambien Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Thae Song, Kang Kwan Il, Hwang Pyong So, Hong Yong Chil, Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon, Kim Thaek Gu y el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en esa provincia, Ryu Yong Sop.
					
					Antes de presenciar la funcion, el Mariscal tomo foto de recuerdo junto con los obreros del Combinado de Tractores de Kanggye.
					
					En la escena se presentaron diversas piezas, como el coro femenino "Cancion de la defensa de la Patria", la musica ligera "A la batalla decisiva", el solo femenino y Pangchang "Por las generaciones venideras", los coros femeninos "Tapare con mi cuerpo la proxima aspillera  enemiga", "Con el espiritu del tiempo de guerra" y "Adelante Corea, acatando la linea de desarrollo paralelo", el duo femenino y Pangchang "?Que es la vida?", el coro femenino "Cancion de artilleros", la musica ligera "De un tiron", etc.
					
					Las ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico las inmortales proezas revolucionarias del Mariscal, quien dirige a la cabecera la construccion de una patria prospera realizando la direccion en el terreno a modo de marcha forzada, y el temperamento indoblegable de los militares y civiles coreanos que unidos compactamente en torno al Mariscal, ponen de pleno manifiesto el gallardo aspecto de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Mariscal pronuncio discurso historico ante los obreros de Jagang.
					
					Dijo que durante su visita a varias fabricas de la ciudad de Kanggye, ha sido testigo presencial de la dinamica lucha de la clase obrera que acatando con el corazon el espiritu del pleno de marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del PTC, se ha levantado como un solo hombre para materializarlo.
					
					Y expreso agradecimiento a nombre del CC del PTC a los obreros del Combinado de Tractores de Kanggye, el Combinado de Maquinas de Precision de Kanggye y la Fabrica de Maquinas Herramientas Jangjagang.
					
					Apunto que recorriendo varias fabricas donde estan grabadas las huellas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, se sintio muy estimulado y redoblo la decision de impulsar mejor en el futuro la revolucion junto con la fidedigna clase obrera.
					
					Recalco que concede gran importancia a varias fabricas de la ciudad de Kanggye y subrayo que los obreros de ellas deben continuar con exito la orgullosa tradicion de haber defendido a ultranza al Partido y al lider con grandes exitos de produccion.
					
					Presento las tareas combativas que corresponden a la clase obrera de Jagang, destacando que las fabricas deben normalizar la produccion en alto nivel y librar la campana para conquistar las tecnologias de punta con vistas a elevar el nivel de modernizacion y cientifizacion de los procesos de produccion, establecer la cultura de produccion y vida conveniente a la era del Songun e impulsar constantemente los trabajos para mejorar el abastecimiento.
					
					Deseo que haya siempre glorias en el futuro camino de los obreros de la provincia y expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos cumpliran plenamente con sus honrosas misiones.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Maquinas Herramientas Jangjagang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Maquinas Herramientas Jangjagang
Pyongyang, 24 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito la Fabrica de Maquinas Herramientas Jangjagang.
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Thae Song, Kang Kwan Il, Hwang Pyong So, Hong Yong Chil, Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon y Kim Thaek Gu.
					
					El Mariscal estuvo primero en la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria.
					
					Viendo la foto de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il colocada en el hall de la sala, recordo con emocion aquel dia inolvidable en que ha visitado la fabrica junto con el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Paso revista a las muestras de productos hechos en la fabrica y se entero en detalles de sus especificaciones tecnicas y calidad.
					
					En el taller de prensa, averiguo como se procesan los materiales.
					
					En el proximo taller automatizado, examino el proceso automatizado, compuesto de la celula de produccion flexible, coche de transporte de materiales sin chofer, almacen automatico, etc. y se mostro muy complacido de que hayan sido mejoradas radicalmente la eficiencia de produccion, la calidad de productos y el ambiente de produccion independientemente de las condiciones complicadas tales como los preparativos tecnicos, los de produccion y el cambio de composicion de productos.
					
					Mirando los coches sin chofer transportando correctamente los materiales desde el almacen y distribuyendolos a las maquinas, dijo sonriente que es muy ventajosa la automatizacion y la fabrica esta muy elegante.
					
					El Mariscal elogio el taller como modelo donde esta materializada y sintetizada la idea de conquistar las tecnologias de punta presentada por el Dirigente, quien acentuaba la necesidad de realizar la automatizacion perfecta de todos los procesos de produccion, y como herencia legada por el.
					
					Como resultado de construccion del taller automatizado, la fabrica puede asegurar la calidad de productos con la capacidad incomparablemente aumentada, asevero y agrego que sera rentable producir exclusivamente en esta fabrica los productos de igual especie que se hacian en otras varias fabricas.
					
					En el futuro, hay que materializar activamente en todas las ramas y unidades la automatizacion segun requisitos de la epoca de economia basada en intelectualidad, senalo y continuo que para ese fin, es necesario experimentar en carne propia las ventajas de automatizacion como en esta fabrica. Y definio la fabrica como norma de automatizacion.
					
					Las fabricas y empresas deben tomar como cuestion principal de modernizacion lograr la automatizacion, dijo y reitero que es la orientacion invariable del Partido eliminar los trabajos manuales de los obreros.
					
					El Mariscal se fotografio junto a los funcionarios en el terreno de produccion del taller automatizado que fue laureado con el Premio Kim Il Sung.
					
					Dio valiosas instrucciones de dinamizar mas la campana para alcanzar en el nivel mas elevado la modernizacion y cientifizacion del proceso de produccion a base de las experiencias sacadas del curso de automatizacion del taller de elaboracion de maquinas y resolvio los problemas que surgen en acondicionar mejor la fabrica.
					
					El Mariscal expuso la esperanza de que los empleados de la fabrica logren mayores exitos en la produccion y construccion cumpliendo el legado del Dirigente, y tomo foto de recuerdo junto a ellos.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente mozambiqueno
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente mozambiqueno
Pyongyang, 24 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 20 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Mozambique, Armando Emilio Guebuza, con motivo del dia nacional de ese pais africano. 
					Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre los dos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas, el remitente desea mayores exitos al destinatario en su trabajo para el desarrollo y prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre zona de Komdok
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre zona de Komdok
Pyongyang, 24 de junio (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, recorrio varios lugares de la zona de Komdok averiguando la produccion en las minas y empresas y la prevencion de los danos en la estacion de lluvias.
					El premier estimulo a los funcionarios y obreros de las minas y empresas que registran innovaciones en la produccion guardando la importancia de su deber revolucionario. 
					
					Se realizo la reunion consultiva, ocasion en la cual se discutieron los asuntos para aumentar trascendentalmente la produccion en las minas y empresas incluso la Mina Heroina Juventud de Taehung, en pleno acato al noble proposito del partido, y ampliar el comercio de elaboracion. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, se dio enfasis a la importancia de poner en funcionamiento las instalaciones y modernizarlas. 
					
					Y se tomaron las medidas para suministrar en los ministerios, organos centrales y otras unidades relacionadas las materias primas y materiales necesarios y para prevenir los danos en la estacion de lluvias.

articles.title: Premier coreano realiza recorrido por zona de Tanchon
articles.content:
Premier coreano realiza recorrido por zona de Tanchon
Pyongyang, 24 de junio (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno las gestiones de la Fabrica de Magnesia de Tanchon, la Fundicion de Metales no Ferrosos de Tanchon y el Puerto de Tanchon.
					Recorriendo varios puntos de la zona de Tanchon, el estimulo a la clase obrera que esta registrando innovaciones en la produccion en acato al llamamiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un de abrir nueva era dorada en todos los frentes de la construccion del socialismo al crear la "velocidad Masikryong".
					
					En la reunion consultiva convocada en el terreno se debatieron los problemas como dar acicate a la modernizacion de los equipos, concluir en un corto tiempo la construccion de nuevos procesos de produccion, usar y cuidar bien el Puerto de Tanchon.
					
					Tambien se tomaron las medidas orientadas a activar la produccion de la Fabrica de Magnesia de Tanchon y otras unidades al materializar cabalmente el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y hacer a los ministerios, organos centrales y otras unidades vinculadas suministrar suficientemente las materias primas y materiales necesarios a la modernizacion y construccion.
					
					Por otra parte, el premier se entero del estado de gestion de la Mina de Sangnong.
					
					Dando vuelta por varios puntos de la mina, destaco la necesidad de completar la modernizacion y cientifizacion de la produccion de minerales y elevar el rendimiento de concentracion al realizar la excavacion y procesamiento de minerales en grandes cantidades.

articles.title: AHC publica memorando del curso de provocacion de pasada guerra coreana por EE.UU.
articles.content:
AHC publica memorando del curso de provocacion de pasada guerra coreana por EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 24 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 60o aniversario del triunfo del pueblo coreano en la gran Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953), la Asociacion de Historiadores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publico este lunes un memorando para revelar la naturaleza de Estados Unidos como provocador de esa contienda belica. 
					El documento califica al imperialismo norteamericano de caudillo de agresion que trajo la chispa de confrontacion entre ambas partes coreanas y de guerra fratricida. 
					
					Despues de la segunda guerra mundial, EE.UU. ocupo la mitad del territorio coreano en virtud de su criminal politica de agredir a Corea y tomar la hegemonia mundial e instigo la confrontacion fratricida causando incontables sufrimientos y desgracias a la nacion coreana. 
					
					Desde hace un siglo y varias decadas, EE.UU. tomaba como su politica estatal agredir y dominar el territorio coreano, puerta del continente asiatico. 
					
					En febrero de 1845, los gobernantes estadounidenses de aquel entonces sometieron a la consideracion del Congreso el "proyecto de apertura de Corea" y se valieron de todos los medios y metodos para agredirla. 
					
					El imperio inicio la agresion a Corea mediante la intrusion del barco "Sherman" en 1866 y en este incidente sufrio gran derrota ante la lucha de los pobladores de Mangyongdae y de los militares y civiles de la ciudadela de Pyongyang. 
					
					Se reportaron luego otros incidentes, entre otros, la intrusion de barcos "Shenandoah" y "China" en 1868 y la invasion armada en 1871. 
					
					Desde el 10 al 15 de agosto de 1945, el imperialismo norteamericano invento el paralelo 38o bajo el pretexto de definir "linea divisoria" para recibir la capitulacion del ejercito japones y ocupo el suelo surcoreano desde el 8 de septiembre a finales de octubre de ese ano con el disfraz de "ejercito libertador". 
					
					El 7 de septiembre de 1945, EE.UU. promulgo el decreto no. 1 de la comandancia de MacArthur, en el cual declaro publicamente que practicaria la administracion militar en toda la extension surcoreana. 
					
					Al remitir injustamente el problema coreano a la ONU, invento la "resolucion" sobre las "elecciones" separadas en el Sur de Corea y fabrico de manera violenta y fraudulenta el "poder" proyanqui y anticomunista en esa parte coreana. 
					
					El memorando narra que despues de fabricado el poder titere en el Sur de Corea, EE.UU. acelero los preparativos de guerra anti-RPDC. 
					
					Organizo el ejercito titere surcoreano que jugaria el papel de brigada de choque en la guerra de agresion y lo amplio bruscamente. 
					
					Hizo permanecer en el Sur de Corea el cuerpo de 500 asesores militares, el mas numeroso para aquel entonces, para modificar al estilo norteamericano el sistema de mando y la formacion de unidades del ejercito surcoreano y hasta sus entrenamientos. 
					
					La naturaleza de EE.UU., que auspicio los preparativos de la guerra de agresion, se puede conocer tambien en el curso de elaboracion y perfeccionamiento del plan correspondiente. 
					
					Dividio en tres etapas el plan de guerra, o sea, desatar la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC, extenderla a China y agredir a Siberia. Y tenia previsto desatar la guerra en 1949.
					
					Para revisar la eficiencia de ese guion, lanzo al ejercito surcoreano a cometer provocaciones militares contra la RPDC. 
					
					Por consiguiente, en los alrededores del paralelo 38o no cesaron hasta el 25 de junio de 1950 las batallas que hicieron imaginar una guerra de verdad. 
					
					El imperialismo norteamericano promovio tambien un complot taimado y sucio para eludir la responsabilidad del estallido de guerra. 
					
					En el cuarto periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, sesionado en octubre de 1949, EE.UU. fabrico la tercera "comision de la ONU para Corea" cuya mision estuvo en encubrir la verdad de estallido de la guerra coreana e invertirla bajo el rotulo de "vigilar" e "informar" el "conflicto armado en Corea". 
					
					Por otra parte, se trazaron con antelacion los "documentos basicos" y los "proyectos de resolucion" a ser sometidos a la consideracion del Consejo de Seguridad y la Asamblea General de la ONU despues de que estallara la guerra coreana. 
					
					En junio de 1950, Dulles arribo a Seul e inspecciono en el terreno los puestos militares del ejercito surcoreano en las inmediaciones del paralelo 38o y reviso finalmente el plan de guerra examinando la maqueta y el mapa operacional. 
					
					Coincidiendo con la visita de Dulles a Seul, el secretario de Defensa y el presidente de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor de EE.UU. visitaron la comandancia de MacArthur en Tokio con el fin de decidir la incorporacion de las fuerzas norteamericanas estacionadas en el Extremo Oriente en la guerra coreana y revisar en el terreno la disposicion de combate. 
					
					A las 4 de la madrugada del 25 de junio de 1950, el imperialismo norteamericano lanzo a las unidades militares surcoreanas a la guerra criminal y agresiva contra la RPDC. 
					
					MacArthur, quien jugo el papel de protagonista en el estallido de guerra, confeso su crimen diciendo: "esa guerra fue mi plan".
					
					Por ultimo, el documento advierte a EE.UU. que no olvide su antecedente vergonzoso de haberse rendido ante el pueblo coreano, pese a que ha movilizado enormes efectivos y armamentos sofisticados en la pasada guerra coreana de la decada de 1950.
